item.title: Tick marks, variable names, and ggplot2
item.description: Regardless, while it’s definitely a good idea to provide your own summary variable names, you will invariably find yourself in a situation where you would like to plot summarized variables that were named using the text of the expressions used to create them. The following section describes three common mistakes users make that result in the mapping of incorrect…
